title: What is Jordan Peterson Doing with the Bible?
description:
Here's my first attempt at a short to summarize some of what I've figured out making my far longer videos trying to figure out Jordan Peterson's Bible Series.

Here's the video where I talk about how JBP is like The Office. https://youtu.be/6gqoeqOxfO0 

Here's the link to the Commentary Series. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZiVwwUdCjc&list=PLYSXopxC8Z9sUfuJWJWIq2PN3_a0nvIAn
